item.title: Used sanitary products, 27th February
item.description:
Along with the dirty nappies which have opened and we now have faeces all over the road. There is used sanitary pads littered across the pavement. It’s now becoming a health hazard. This is the fourth time this issue is being reported and cleaned but they keep dumping there bags. Something more must be done.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19-26, Batchwood Green, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain overflowing causing puddles and leakage on pavement and car bays., 27th February
item.description:
Drain is overflowing, probably due to blockage. Causing a puddle in the parking pay which overflows onto pavement when it rains. Also causing dirt/sewage to come up from manhole cover onto pavement. The drain needs to be unblocked and the pavement needs to be jetwashed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4-7, Lime Row, Lower Belvedere, Erith, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
